title: v1.6.4.2 TypeError Fix for undefined position
details:
Bug Fix: Manager Minimize Button TypeError - position undefined

Root Cause: UICoordinator and storage code accessed quickTab.position.left without checking if position exists. Storage can return Quick Tabs with missing position data.

Fix Strategy:
1. UICoordinator.js: Added _getSafePosition(), _getSafeSize(), _getSafeVisibility() helper methods to provide safe defaults
2. storage-utils.js: Added _getNumericValue() and _getArrayValue() helpers to handle both flat (tab.left) and nested (tab.position.left) formats
3. quick-tabs-manager.js: Added _getValue() helper for the same purpose

Key Insight: Quick Tab data can come in two formats:
- Flat: tab.left, tab.top, tab.width, tab.height
- Nested: tab.position.left, tab.position.top, tab.size.width, tab.size.height

Always use nullish coalescing (??) to check both formats with fallback defaults.
